mapper.select: SELECT taskarealog_id AS id, taskpointlogtable.taskpointlog_id, taskarealog_type AS record_type, taskarealog_minTemp AS min_temp, taskarealog_maxTemp AS max_temp, taskarealog_alarmTemp AS alarm_temp, taskarealog_time AS time, taskarealog.area_id AS area_id, areatable.point_id AS point_id , alarmtable.alarm_id, taskpointlogtable.taskpointlog_minTemp ${columns} FROM taskarealog_table taskarealog JOIN area_table areatable ON taskarealog.area_id = areatable.area_id and areatable.area_name <>"" JOIN point_table pointtable ON areatable.point_id = pointtable.point_id JOIN monitor_table monitortable ON pointtable.monitor_id = monitortable.monitor_id LEFT JOIN alarm_table alarmtable ON alarmtable.alarm_time=taskarealog.taskarealog_time AND taskarealog.area_id=alarmtable.area_id JOIN taskpointlog_table taskpointlogtable ON taskpointlogtable.taskpointlog_id=taskarealog.taskpointlog_id ${filter};
SELECT count(*) as total FROM taskarealog_table taskarealog ${filter};

select taskarealog_id as id, taskpointlog_id, taskarealog_type as record_type, taskarealog_minTemp as min_temp, taskarealog_maxTemp as max_temp, taskarealog_alarmTemp as alarm_temp, taskarealog_time as time, area_id from taskarealog_table where taskarealog_id = #{id};
